item.title: Beogram 4002 (5503): Keyboard Repair - Detached Backstops
item.description:
Following the AC motor hood restoration on a Beogram 4002 (5503), the next cosmetic issue addressed was the loose keypad backstops. Some keys were protruding and functioned erratically, requiring multiple presses. Upon removing the keypad and its PCB, it was discovered that several plastic backstops had detached. A previous attempt to reattach them using double-sided tape proved unsuccessful, causing an uneven keypad surface. The remaining backstops were easily removed, but precisely reattaching them posed a challenge...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/beogram-4002-5503-keyboard-repair-detached-backstops/

item.title: Selecting the appropriate tea for the workplace break room
item.description:
It’s common to find pre-mixed tea sachets or teabags in office pantries. While these are convenient and widely available, Teabox, an online retailer specializing in premium Indian teas, suggests there might be downsides to these options. Source: Teabox website. Teabox CEO, Kaushal Dugar, explains that tea dust, a byproduct of tea production, lacks the full flavor, taste, and aroma of whole tea leaves. This tea dust is often what ends up in teabags, resulting in a less flavorful and potentially less nutritious cup...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/selecting-the-appropriate-tea-for-the-workplace-break-room/
